name: Ability Timeline (Bossmods)
description:
This WA is a replacement of the DBM and BigWigs default timer bars, with lots of customization options. You will still need either DBM or BigWigs installed for it to work. This WA simply hijacks DBM/BW timers and makes its own timers. Supports highlighting specific Alerts via replacing the text or adding TextColor/Glow while also giving you the ability to add "ticks" on the bar to more clearly put an emphasis on the abilitys that are about to happen within 5/10 seconds THERE IS NO USE IN ME ANSWERING "OH IT'S NOT WORKING" MESSAGES SO I WILL ONLY RESPOND TO THEM IF A BUGSACK MESSAGE IS INCLUDED!!! FAQ & Known Issues: read below before posting a question Q: My BW bars sometimes keep showing eventhough i have "hide bw bars" enabled? A: Make sure the bar style in bw options is set to default. Also make sure you have not changed the limit settings for bars. BigWigs -> Bars -> Bars tab -> Visible bar limit (default is 100). Q: My DBM bars keep showing eventhough i have "hide dbm bars" enabled? A: Using Addonskins together with that option will never work. Also make sure to /reload after updating the aura. Q: The timeline used to show Trash mob abilities. Why doesn't it do that anymore? A: It was a bug in dbm that they showed at all and that got fixed. If you realy want that make your case here Q: I don't have cooldowntext on my icon like in the gif how do i fix? A: You either go to the aura called "raid ability icon" there go to the display tab and check the box infront of the text that says %p or you use external addons like OmniCC or Elvui's Cooldown text Q: Does this work in dungeons? A: Yes. If your DBM or BW currently works in dungeons, then this WA will too. Q: How to change the size of the icons A: Display tab -> Icon size. Q: How to move text to the right side A: go to display tab press the coghweel on text 1 and change this setting https://imgur.com/a/pI8FtIy . Repeat this for both the icon waiting group and the "Raid Ability Timeline Icon <10". Q: Is there a way to make it horizontal instead of vertical? A: The problem with lining up icons horizontally is that there wouldn't be enough room for the spell name text above/below each icon, since the text orientation is always horizontal as well. There is a community version of this that you can find if you look for it but no support will be given to people using that fork. Q: How do i get the Icons to look like in the Preview? A: If you dislike the default look of icons there are various ways to get icons "skinned". Below are some options
  1. Masque and skins like ElvUIesque or Flat Squares - Curseforge
  2. Clean Icons: Thin - WoWInterface (This replaces art files and will apply to everything that uses the icon)
  3. Clean Icons: Mechagnome Edition -- (AI neural network image upscaling), bigger file sizes, but better image quality: WoWInterface
  4. Simply use the Zoom setting in the WA Display tab (around 30% usually removes the ugly border)
Q: HALP! My DBM bars are gone forever after uninstalling this WA. A: Paste the following macro into your chat /run DBT:ResetSkin() if that doesn't do the trick (which it should) go into WTF\Account\<Account #>\SavedVariables\ and delete DBM-StatusBarTimers.lua Every feedback/help is greatly appreciated feel free to contact me by joining my Discord. If you like my work and want to support me you can donate
changelog: In a recent Iteration, the Timeline was acting up and wasn't properly accepting the travel duration input. It has been shown some manners and will now properly adhere to the given input.

name: Mythic+ Interrupt Tracker
description: An Interrupt Tracker does what an Interrupt Tracker does. Also shows if people are dead/out of Range. This Aura relies on a Library that is shipped with WeakAuras Dbm and BW. If a party member doesn't have any of those addons installed their kick won't show up in the list. FAQ & Known Issues: read below before posting a question Q: Can you add spell X? A: This aura was made to track interupts. If any interupt or silence is missing please do ping me about it. This Aura was NOT made to track stuns and other types of cc like blind/disorient that can be used to interrupt some mobs. If cc's would get added you would have a list of like 30 spells per key and thats not very helpful there are other auras to keep track of aoe control. See it like this: If you can interrupt a casting boss it will be considered. If you can't interrupt a boss with the spell it's not being added. Every feedback/help is greatly appreciated feel free to contact me by joining my Discord. Based on the works of Nnoggie If you like my work and want to support me you can donate
changelog: After the 11.2 update Protection warriors learned a new skill and were hiding their interrupts from the tracker. The tracker has now also been taught this lesson and can properly track the CD again!

description: My set of M+ Helpers - Explosive Orbs hide all Nameplates (except orbs) on Pressing specific modifier key (alt/shift etc.) - Hero/Bloodlust reminder (when in bossfight and of cd) - for Affixes Like Bolstering by glowing the highest totalhp unit (Places a marker/glowlow on the highest health mob of the pack and keeps moving it while you damage them. [DOES NOT OVERWRITE EXISTING MARKERS]) - for things like raging by glowing the lowest totalhp unit (Places a marker/glow on the lowest health mob of the pack and keeps moving it while you damage them. [DOES NOT OVERWRITE EXISTING MARKERS]) You can disable the marking in Custom options. if you do not want the weakaura to glow go to actions -> on show and untick the "glow external element" checkbox Sanguine Helper Inspired by https://wago.io/ByV3k3OLG Explosive Orbs hide nameplates minor edited version of https://wago.io/4N7vVthan all credits to Causese Every feedback/help is greatly appreciated feel free to contact me by joining my Discord. name: Power Infusion Helper
description:
Power Infusion Optimizer

This WeakAura intelligently assists Priests in optimizing the use of Power Infusion by identifying the most beneficial targets within your group or raid. Leveraging real-time data and simulations, it ensures that your PI casts contribute maximally to your team’s performance.

How It Works

1. Data Collection

  • Talent Analysis: For each class and specialization, the system retrieves the most prevalent talent builds from Warcraft Logs. Raid logs inform single-target setups, while Mythic+ logs guide multi-target configurations, reflecting the current meta.

2. Simulation Runs

  • Baseline Simulation: Executes a profile without Power Infusion to establish a control DPS value.
  • Buffed Simulation: Runs the same profile with Power Infusion applied once, yielding the enhanced DPS figure.

3. Gain Calculation

The difference between the buffed and baseline DPS values quantifies the exact impact of Power Infusion for each spec and build.
This methodology ensures all variables (talents, gear, fight duration, rotation logic, and target count) remain constant, isolating the effect of Power Infusion.

4. Displaying when to use

The WeakAura get's the logic on when to use directly from the simulationcraft APL (the same thing powering raidbots). It will automatically highlight the group frame who is the most optimal use of PI with icon and glow whenever you should Pi them.

Weekly Updates

The simulation data is refreshed weekly to align with the evolving meta.

For more options and information including talents and gear for each simulation, you can check and generate the WeakAura by clicking this image:

Chat Command: !pi

Utilize the !pi command in chat to display the top candidates for Power Infusion based on the current simulation data.

  • !pi
    Lists the top 5 PI targets with their respective gain values.

This feature aids in real-time decision-making, especially in dynamic group compositions.

If you want to have some sounds, use this addon: SharedMedia Causese If you are using Causeses addon and do NOT want sounds select the group and go to Actions -> on Show and untick play sound Every feedback/help is greatly appreciated feel free to contact me by joining my Discord. Versioncheck Debuff/Interrupt idea stolen from causese props to him If you like my work and want to support me you can donate
changelog: Some small issues were fixed. These are not the changes you are looking for.

name: Anti Elitism Helper
description: Are you sick and Tired of people that are unable to setup the addon properly and spamming the chat with <EH> and having chat bubbles pop up midfight that blind you and let you stand in even more shit? use this wa that helps out against the people unsing elitesim helper by spamming them with whispers like they spam you additional tips: Using Backgroundless Chat bubbles like https://www.tukui.org/forum/viewtopic.php?t=30 there is an interface option to disable chat bubbles from group messages sent (interface -> game -> display) You could also just ignore the guy when the key starts no chat bubbles if he's on ignore DISCLAIMER I would encourage the use of Elitism Helper if it was just listing the Dmg taken AFTER the dungeon instead of spamming stupid speech bubbles mid fight that clutter your screen with unecessary info. Every feedback/help is greatly appreciated feel free to contact me by joining my Discord. If you like my work and want to support me you can donate
changelog: - fixed error messages hider to not accidentaly remove normal chat messages

name: 20 Year Anniversary
description: Shows Timers for the Events and Does a visual and auditory warning when a spell becomes available on the storytime event that you can use. Event timer is heavily based upon Putros TWW event tracker

name: Bg Helper
description: Marks the lowest Hp enemy Warning high cpu usage Every feedback/help is greatly appreciated feel free to contact me by joining my Discord. If you like my work and want to support me you can donate

name: GrimBatol - Flight sim
description: Displays a Number above enemies heads displaying how many shots remaining until they die. First Number is amount of Big shots (spell on 1) Second number amount of small shots (spell on 2) Created during the Q&A Stream over on https://www.twitch.tv/jodsderechte Vod link is here: https://www.twitch.tv/videos/2196443340

name: City of Threads Spyfinder
description: The functionality of this aura that was super helpful got removed. Now it only triggers as soon as you can use the Reveal! spell and can't automark anymore Similar to the Cos aura https://wago.io/COSInteractables this is a liittle Helper for the Spyevent in City of Threads. When mouseovering over the spy they will be automarked and anounced in chat (both if and how they are marked/announced can be adjusted via custom options).
changelog: trigger on getting in range of the extra spell instead. Not rly very useful but might be helpful for some

name: Custom Names - Plater
description: Replaces Unit Name and target names with custom settable Names. for details go to Bars -> text -> custom text and add {func local player, combat = ...; local Lib = LibStub("CustomNames");local trans=LibStub("LibTranslit-1.0");return trans:Transliterate(Lib.Get(string.gsub(player.nome, "%-([A-Z][A-Z])$", ""))):find("-") and player.transliteratedName or trans:Transliterate(Lib.Get(string.gsub(player.nome, "%-([A-Z][A-Z])$", "")));} this should replace data2 (player name) which in total would look like: {data1}. {data3}{func local player, combat = ...; local Lib = LibStub("CustomNames");local trans=LibStub("LibTranslit-1.0");return trans:Transliterate(Lib.Get(string.gsub(player.nome, "%-([A-Z][A-Z])$", ""))):find("-") and player.transliteratedName or trans:Transliterate(Lib.Get(string.gsub(player.nome, "%-([A-Z][A-Z])$", "")));} REQUIRES Custom Names in order to work
changelog: - add support for name only mode

name: M+ Colored Mobs
description: Colored Mobs for Shadowlands Dungeons (More to come) Color Codes: casters: dodgerblue healers: White fixate: magenta charge/jump: cyan frontal: lightcoral physical range dps: palegreen Important stun/buff abilitys: Goldenrod aoe/spin to win effect: navajowhite high priority/focus: deeppink How to Import: /plater > Npc Colors tab > hit the Import button > paste the string and hit okay. How to Edit: /plater > Npc Colors tab > you can edit any color there, also if you do this inside a dungeon you may edit directly in the npc nameplate Every feedback/help is greatly appreciated feel free to contact me by joining my Discord. If you like my work and want to support me you can donate
